name: Vambraces of Sescheron
flavorText: “These look to be of Sescheron origin to me. Strange though - when others use them, they are nothing special. When you use them, well...” — Haedrig
flavorTextHtml: “These look to be of Sescheron origin to me. Strange though - when others use them, they are nothing special. When you use them, well...” — Haedrig

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Your primary skills heal you for 5.5% of your missing Life. (Barbarian Only) [5.0 - 6.0]%
